bibliographic-data.invention-title: HOST-VEHICLE RISK ACQUISITION DEVICE AND METHOD

abstract.p: A host-vehicle risk acquisition device includes a host-vehicle path acquisition portion that acquires a path of a host-vehicle, and an obstacle path acquisition portion that acquires a plurality of paths of an obstacle existing around the host-vehicle. A collision risk acquisition portion acquires an actual collision risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle when the host-vehicle is in a travel state based on the path of the host-vehicle and the plurality of paths of the obstacle. An offset risk acquisition portion acquires an offset risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle in an offset travel state, which is offset from the travel state of the host-vehicle.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: HOST-VEHICLE RISK ACQUISITION DEVICE AND METHOD
DISPOSITIF ET PROCÉDÉ D'ACQUISITION DE RISQUE DE VÉHICULE HÔTE
OWN VEHICLE DEGREE OF RISK ACQUISITION DEVICE

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide an own vehicle degree of risk acquisition device capable of precisely calculating a degree of risk of one's own vehicle and determining a degree of safety to another traveling condition of the own vehicle even when a traveling course has many divergences such as intersections.

SOLUTION: An own vehicle degree of risk acquisition ECU 1 calculates and acquires a plurality of possible traveling courses of the own vehicle and other vehicles around the own vehicle based on the respective traveling conditions. Based on the possible traveling courses of the own vehicle and the other vehicles, the best own vehicle course collision probability (own vehicle degree of risk) is calculated. An own vehicle offset traveling condition, wherein a traveling condition of the own vehicle is offset, is calculated, and based on the own vehicle offset traveling condition, a plurality of possible traveling courses of the own vehicle are calculated to be acquired.

Based on the possible traveling courses of the own vehicle and those of other vehicles calculated based on the own vehicle offset condition, the best own vehicle traveling course collision probability (the degree of offset risk) is calculated.

A host-vehicle risk acquisition device includes a host-vehicle path acquisition portion that acquires a path of a host-vehicle, and an obstacle path acquisition portion that acquires a plurality of paths of an obstacle existing around the host-vehicle. A collision risk acquisition portion acquires an actual collision risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle when the host-vehicle is in a travel state based on the path of the host-vehicle and the plurality of paths of the obstacle. An offset risk acquisition portion acquires an offset risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle in an offset travel state, which is offset from the travel state of the host-vehicle.

abstract.p: A host-vehicle risk acquisition device includes a host-vehicle path acquisition portion that acquires a path of a host-vehicle, and an obstacle path acquisition portion that acquires a plurality of paths of an obstacle existing around the host-vehicle. A collision risk acquisition portion acquires an actual collision risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle when the host-vehicle is in a travel state based on the path of the host-vehicle and the plurality of paths of the obstacle. An offset risk acquisition portion acquires an offset risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle in an offset travel state, which is offset from the travel state of the host-vehicle.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: HOST-VEHICLE RISK ACQUISITION DEVICE AND METHOD
DISPOSITIF ET PROCÉDÉ D'ACQUISITION DE RISQUE DE VÉHICULE HÔTE

abstract.p: A host-vehicle risk acquisition device (1, 10) includes an host-vehicle path acquisition portion (13) that acquires a path of an host-vehicle, and an obstacle path acquisition portion (11) that acquires a plurality of paths of an obstacle existing around the host-vehicle. A collision risk acquisition portion (15) acquires an actual collision risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle when the host-vehicle is in a travel state based on the path of the host-vehicle and the plurality of paths of the obstacle. An offset risk acquisition portion (15) acquires an offset risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle in an offset travel state, which is offset from the travel state of the host-vehicle.

L'invention porte sur un dispositif d'acquisition de risque de véhicule hôte (1, 10) qui comprend une partie d'acquisition de trajet de véhicule hôte (13) qui acquiert un trajet d'un véhicule hôte, et une partie d'acquisition de trajet d'obstacle (11) qui acquiert une pluralité de trajets d'un obstacle existant autour du véhicule hôte. Une partie d'acquisition de risque de collision (15) acquiert un risque de collision réel, qui est un risque de collision entre le véhicule hôte et l'obstacle lorsque le véhicule hôte est dans un état de déplacement sur la base du trajet du véhicule hôte et de la pluralité de trajets de l'obstacle.

Une partie d'acquisition de risque de décalage (15) acquiert un risque de décalage, qui est un risque de collision entre le véhicule hôte et l'obstacle dans un état de déplacement de décalage, qui est décalé à partir de l'état de déplacement du véhicule hôte.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: HOST-VEHICLE RISK ACQUISITION DEVICE AND METHOD
DISPOSITIF ET PROCÉDÉ D'ACQUISITION DE RISQUE DE VÉHICULE HÔTE

An offset risk acquisition portion (15) acquires an offset risk, which is a collision risk between the host-vehicle and the obstacle in an offset travel state, which is offset from the travel state of the host-vehicle.

L'invention porte sur un dispositif d'acquisition de risque de véhicule hôte (1, 10) qui comprend une partie d'acquisition de trajet de véhicule hôte (13) qui acquiert un trajet d'un véhicule hôte, et une partie d'acquisition de trajet d'obstacle (11) qui acquiert une pluralité de trajets d'un obstacle existant autour du véhicule hôte. Une partie d'acquisition de risque de décalage (15) acquiert un risque de décalage, qui est un risque de collision entre le véhicule hôte et l'obstacle dans un état de déplacement de décalage, qui est décalé à partir de l'état de déplacement du véhicule hôte.
